text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump #TrumpResignNow 
#WhereAreTheTests?

That is what the DPA needs to be in place for.
Then meat packing plants, almost all with COVID-19 outbreaks, could safely operate.
Instead we have death camps which produce American beef, pork and poultry without OSHA regulations.
